title: Watch Your Back
description: Devon Mitchell's grandmother leaves him her art gallery.  Thus far he's been content to let things run themselves, until he discovers the gallery is being plagued by accidents and lost profits.  On a hiatus from the corporate life, Devon decides to go to DC and investigate from within.  He hires himself at his own gallery to be the new director.  The only problem is that the gallery already has an acting director, Jayde Seaton, who was promised the position.  Now Jayde's none too happy to discover that a man completely unsuitable for the job just got the corner office!
author: Lisa Y. Watson
